message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $100 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit your needs. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $95, a special deal considering its market value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to acquire something truly valuable at an attractive price. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
